  • new FileFactory(fileOptions: FileOptions): File

  • Inherited from FileFactory.constructor

    • Defined in lib/binding/FileFactory.ts:162

    Creates a new file object which represents the file at the given ID

    Data provided to the constructor will be uploaded by invoking {@link upload()}.

    Parameters

    • fileOptions: FileOptions

      The fileOptions used to create a new file object, or just the id of the file object

    Returns File

    A new file instance

listFiles

  • listFiles(folderOrPath: File | string, start: File, count: number, doneCallback?: any, failCallback?: any): Promise<File[]>
    • Defined in lib/binding/FileFactory.ts:143

    Lists the files (and folders) in the given folder.

    Parameters

    • folderOrPath: File | string

      The folder/path to list.

    • start: File

      The file/folder from where to start listing (not included)

    • count: number

      The maximum number of files to return.

    • Optional doneCallback: any

      The callback is invoked with the listed files

    • Optional failCallback: any

      The callback is invoked if any error has occurred

    Returns Promise<File[]>

    The listed files/folders.

loadMetadata

  • loadMetadata(bucket: string, options?: undefined | { refresh?: undefined | false | true }, doneCallback?: any, failCallback?: any): Promise<RootFolderMetadata>
    • Defined in lib/binding/FileFactory.ts:101

    Gets the metadata of the root folder (formally the file "bucket")

    Parameters

    • bucket: string

      The name of the root file directory

    • Optional options: undefined | { refresh?: undefined | false | true }

      The load metadata options

    • Optional doneCallback: any

      The callback is invoked after the metadata is fetched

    • Optional failCallback: any

      The callback is invoked if any error has occurred

    Returns Promise<RootFolderMetadata>

    A promise which will be fulfilled with the bucket ACLs
